column4: gdm's broken again...it was running fine with the nvidia driver, then I rebooted and now I get the gdm startup sound but just a black screen
I tried replacing the xorg.conf with the xorg.conf.old but that didn't fix it
check your Xorg.0.log then. pastebin it
Will be tricky, I'm on a text-only interface now.
I don't know how to do that
you don't. you can use a text mode browser to simply upload the file
I don't understand, upload it to where?
OK, I figured out how to paste in, but how do I get the URL now? I selected the Paste! link and opened it
Hm, that's odd...on closer examination it looks like gnome is displaying *something*, it's just all in a very very thin line across the top of the monitor
I don't know what that is.
